content.question: The price elasticity of demand for a product is 0.5. If the price of the product increases by 20 percent, which of the following will occur?

choices.label: The quantity demanded of the good will increase by 10%.
The quantity demanded of the good will increase by 20%.
The quantity demanded of the good will increase by 40%.
The quantity demanded of the good will decrease by 10%.
The quantity demanded of the good will decrease by 40%.

content.answer: The quantity demanded of the good will decrease by 10%.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
